scripts.i-all: lerna link && lerna exec npm install
scripts.publish: npm run prepublishOnly2  && lerna publish --force-publish=pro/plus-core --conventional-commits --create-release github && npm run afterpublishOnly && npm run commitAll
scripts.afterpublishOnly: time /t >build.trigger && git add ./build.trigger && git commit -m "build: trigger build image" && TIMEOUT /T 10 && git push
scripts.commitAll: git add . && git commit -m "build: publish" && git push && npm run commitPro
scripts.commitPro: cd ./packages/core/ && git add . && git commit -m "build: publish" && git push
scripts.prepublishOnly1: npm run check && lerna run build
scripts.prepublishOnly2: npm run check && npm run before-build && lerna run build
scripts.before-build: npm run transform-sql && cd ./packages/core/basic && time /t >build.md && git add ./build.md && git commit -m "build: prepare to build"
